item.description:
CALLING ALL VIRGINS!!!!!!!

Join my friend and I for a night of kinky fun that does not involve taking our clothes off!!! On Saturday, July 12th at 10:30 PM, I will be hosting the greatest midnight movie of all time, THE ROCKY HORROR PICTURE SHOW!!!!!
Now before making a commitment to join this wonderful event, please keep a few things in mind:

EVERYBODY IS RESPONSIBLE FOR HIS OR HER?S OWN TRANSPORTATION. That being said, if you have a car and you are willing to drive people home at around 2:30 in the morning, please let me know when you sign up. Of course, calling for a taxi ahead of time is always an option as well.

IF YOU ARE UPTIGHT, PLEASE DO NOT SIGN UP FOR THIS EVENT. There will be a lot strange happenings going on, in and out of the theatre. I would tell you more but, that would spoil the fun!!!

If you have only seen this movie on television or on a DVD and never seen it on the big screen, you are in for one hell of an experience!!! See all of you ?unconventional uncoventionists? on Saturday, July 12th!!!

Walter

FOR MORE INFORMATION, CLICK HERE (IF YOU DARE!!!): Full Body Cast Website
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in front of the theatre with a Meetup sign
item.name: LET'S DO THE TIME WARP!!!! Rocky Horror Picture Show at the AMC Loews
